name: Isletography
description:
Explore a rich remote islet and capture beautiful moments.

*Important: Mouse sensitivity on browser plays is weirdly high: it can be adjusted via the Escape key while exited out of full screen mode!

Spoiler clue: Try talking to the rabbit looking at footprints or the lynx with the telescope (E to interact)

Art & Level Design
Viv Lun
